dedukti: thm07 : (p : Elem Nat) -> (q : Elem Nat) -> Proof (and (prime p) (prime q)) -> Proof (Eq (times (legendre p q) (legendre q p)) (pow (neg 1) (times (div (minus p 1) 2) (div (minus q 1) 2)))) .
agda: postulate thm07 : (p : Nat) -> (q : Nat) -> and (prime p) (prime q) -> Eq (times (legendre p q) (legendre q p)) (pow (neg 1) (times (div (minus p 1) 2) (div (minus q 1) 2)))
coq: Axiom thm07 : forall p : nat, forall q : nat, (prime p /\ prime q -> legendre p q * legendre q p = pow (neg 1) ((p - 1) / 2 * ((q - 1) / 2))) .

dedukti: thm10FermatLittle : (p : Elem Nat) -> Proof (prime p) -> (a : Elem Int) -> Proof (exists Int (q => Eq (minus (pow a p) a) (times p q))) .
agda: postulate thm10FermatLittle : (p : Nat) -> prime p -> (a : Int) -> exists Int (\ q -> Eq (minus (pow a p) a) (times p q))
coq: Axiom thm10FermatLittle : forall p : nat, (prime p -> ((a : Int) -> Exist Int (fun q => pow a p - a = p * q))) .
lean: axiom thm10FermatLittle (p : Nat) (x : prime p) (a : Int) : Exist Int (λ q => pow a p - a = p * q)

dedukti: thm11 : (n : Elem Nat) -> Proof (exists Nat (p => and (Geq p n) (prime p))) .
agda: postulate thm11 : (n : Nat) -> exists Nat (\ p -> and (Geq p n) (prime p))
coq: Axiom thm11 : forall n : nat, Exist nat (fun p => Geq p n /\ prime p) .
lean: axiom thm11 (n : Nat) : Exist Nat (λ p => p ≥ n ∧ prime p)
InformathEng: Thm11. Let $n$ be an instance of natural numbers. Then we can prove that there exists a natural number $p$, such that $p$ is greater than or equal to $n$ and $p$ is prime.
Thm11. For all instances $n$ of natural numbers, we can prove that there exists a natural number $p$, such that $p$ is greater than or equal to $n$ and $p$ is prime.

Thm11. We can prove that $p$ is greater than or equal to $n$ and $p$ is prime for a natural number $p$ for every instance $n$ of natural numbers.
Thm11. We can prove that $p$ is greater than or equal to $n$ and $p$ is prime for a natural number $p$ for all instances $n$ of natural numbers.

dedukti: thm19 : (n : Elem Nat) -> Proof (exists Nat (a => exists Nat (b => exists Nat (c => exists Nat (d => Eq n (plus (plus (plus (square a) (square b)) (square c)) (square d))))))) .

dedukti: thm20b : (p : Elem Nat) -> Proof (prime p) -> Proof (congruent p 1 4) -> Proof (exists Nat (x => exists Nat (y => Eq p (plus (square x) (square y))))) .
agda: postulate thm20b : (p : Nat) -> prime p -> congruent p 1 4 -> exists Nat (\ x -> exists Nat (\ y -> Eq p (plus (square x) (square y))))
coq: Axiom thm20b : forall p : nat, (prime p -> congruent p 1 4 -> Exist nat (fun x => Exist nat (fun y => p = square x + square y))) .
lean: axiom thm20b (p : Nat) (x : prime p) (y : congruent p 1 4) : Exist Nat (λ x => Exist Nat (λ y => p = square x + square y))
